name: Stomp (TheKing0x9)
description:
Stomp is (should have been😅) a sharable platformer, built with the the idea of having levels that would be designed by, and shared between players.

The sharing part is still highly work in progress, and more updates will be shared soon.

Made with ❤ in Luxe Engine. Originally made for the Luxe Jam #1

Credits:

  • The art and audio assets used in the game are from [Ansimuz's Stomper]. A huge thanks to him.
